name: Big, Big, & Bigger
description:
Big, Big, & Bigger, is a small speed-running dropper that I've made in around one week. It might seem pretty average but there's, a twist! The more you play the bigger "Smiley" aka your character gets.

I made this game in a game jam with Jkcruz. Make sure to check out his game here!

Credits to
ChillMindscapes - Chiptune Music Pack
Poppy Works - Silver Font
Cania - Simple Sky Pixel Backgrounds
